This is an analysis of the ToothGrowth data in the R datasets package. The analysis will provide a basic summary of the data and use confidence intervals and/or hypothesis tests to compare tooth growth by supp and dose.
## Load ToothGrowth data
```{r}
library(datasets)
data(ToothGrowth)
str(ToothGrowth)
```
## Summary of ToothGrowth dataset
```{r}
ToothGrowth$dose <- as.factor(ToothGrowth$dose)
summary(ToothGrowth)
table(ToothGrowth$supp, ToothGrowth$dose)
```

## Boxplot of ToothGrowth Dose Summary
```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
data(ToothGrowth)
df<- data.frame(ToothGrowth)
ggplot(df,aes(x=factor(dose), y=len, fill=supp)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme(legend.position=c(1,0), legend.justification=c(1,0))+ 
  ggtitle("Tooth Growth in relation to dose by supp")







```
